## AUDIT-10 vs ESPAD

In psychology and social sciences, it is often necessary to compare different questionnaires. One such example would be comparing AUDIT-10 (Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test) and ESPAD (European School Survey Project on Alcohol and Drugs). These two important questionnaires used in research fields have different angles of probing into substance use problems among individuals. 

## Compare the items in AUDIT-10 and ESPAD

 One of the significant challenges faced by researchers when comparing questionnaires like AUDIT-10 and ESPAD is the enormous amount of time it takes to manually scrutinize each item and its equivalent in the other set. This time-consuming task can be efficiently tackled using *Harmony*. Whether the comparison is about the frequency of alcohol intake questioned in AUDIT-10 or smoking behaviour scenarios queried in ESPAD, *Harmony* can help find and code such matches, contributing significantly to your overall productivity.

Also worth mentioning, *Harmony* comfortably handles questionnaires in various languages, making the 'AUDIT-10 vs ESPAD' comparison possible irrespective of the language used in your research. Simply dropping your questionnaire material onto 'https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app', you can get started with your harmonizing work. Using *Harmony* for comparing 'AUDIT-10 vs ESPAD' not only simplifies your research process but also provides a more objective analysis result, ultimately giving a boost to your research quality.
